meaningMnemonic: On every <radical>boat</radical> there is a <radical>table</radical> with a <radical>lid</radical> on it that's used for <kanji>navigation</kanji>. When you take the lid off, there is a big map, a sextant, and some little boat miniatures. All the navigation tools.
readingMnemonic: You watch the <kanji>navigation</kanji> equipment roll away and then you feel a slap on the back of your head. Ouch! You turn around and there stands <reading>こう</reading>いち, who you took with you as the navigator of this expedition. And, you just lost all his stuff!
